location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter in response to reports that Bruce has given the responsibility of collecting freight from ships to James Orton instead of Stephen Henshaw against the wishes of the merchants in Bushire and reminding Bruce not to interfere.Also included is a copy of a letter from Stephen Henshaw to Sir Evan Nepean, dated 15 May 1816, describing his situation at Bushire and requesting that he may be permitted to collect freight.
